entries.title: The Boss Baby
entries.description: A story about how a new baby's arrival impacts a family, told from the point of view of a delightfully unreliable narrator, a wildly imaginative 7 year old named Tim.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation,DreamWorks Animation

entries.title: Beauty and the Beast
entries.description: A live-action adaptation of Disney's version of the classic 'Beauty and the Beast' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.

credits.role: Village Man / Cage Seller / Lavender Seller (uncredited)
credits.name: Marlonde Pierre

entries.title: Logan
entries.description: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X in a hide out on the Mexican border. But Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are up-ended when a young mutant arrives, being pursued by dark forces.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation,Donners' Company,Marvel Entertainment,TSG Entertainment

entries.title: Sing
entries.description: A koala named Buster recruits his best friend to help him drum up business for his theater by hosting a singing competition.

entries.title: Kong: Skull Island
entries.description: Explore the mysterious and dangerous home of the king of the apes as a team of explorers ventures deep inside the treacherous, primordial island.

entries.title: Ghost in the Shell
entries.description: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Paramount Pictures,DreamWorks SKG,Shanghai Film Group,Reliance Entertainment,Arad Productions,Grosvenor Park Productions,Steven Paul Production,Huahua Media,Seaside Entertainment

entries.title: The Fate of the Furious
entries.description: When a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.

credits.role: New York Pedestrian / Tourist / Girl at Flower Stand
credits.name: Connie Kincer

entries.title: Split
entries.description: Though Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr. Fletcher, there remains one still submerged who is set to materialize and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls led by the willful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him â as well as everyone around him â as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

credits.role: Dennis / Patricia / Hedwig / The Beast / Kevin Wendell Crumb / Barry / Orwell / Jade
credits.name: James McAvoy

entries.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
entries.description: In 1926, Newt Scamander arrives at the Magical Congress of the United States of America with a magically expanded briefcase, which houses a number of dangerous creatures and their habitats. When the creatures escape from the briefcase, it sends the American wizarding authorities after Newt, and threatens to strain even further the state of magical and non-magical relations.

entries.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
entries.description: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Lucasfilm,Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures,Allison Shearmur Productions,Black Hangar Studios

entries.title: Finding Dory
entries.description: Dory is reunited with her friends Nemo and Marlin in the search for answers about her past. What can she remember? Who are her parents? And where did she learn to speak Whale?

entries.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
entries.description: In the fourth installment of the fighting franchise, Boyka is shooting for the big leagues when an accidental death in the ring makes him question everything he stands for. When he finds out the wife of the man he accidentally killed is in trouble, Boyka offers to fight in a series of impossible battles to free her from a life of servitude

entries.title: Demain tout commence
entries.description: A man without attachments or responsibilities suddenly finds himself with an abandoned baby and leaves for London to try and find the mother. Eight years later after he and his daughter become inseparable Gloria's mother reappears.

entries.title: Arrival
entries.description: Taking place after alien crafts land around the world, an expert linguist is recruited by the military to determine whether they come in peace or are a threat.

credits.role: Deputy Director of the CIA Dan Ryder

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Paramount Pictures,21 Laps Entertainment,FilmNation Entertainment,Lava Bear Films,Xenolinguistics

entries.title: La La Land
entries.description: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Marc Platt Productions,Gilbert Films,Black Label Media,Impostor Pictures

entries.title: Doctor Strange
entries.description: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under his wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Marvel Studios,Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures

entries.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
entries.description: Vampire death dealer Selene fends off brutal attacks from both the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. With her only allies, David and his father Thomas, she must stop the eternal war between Lycans and Vampires, even if it means she has to make the ultimate sacrifice.

entries.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
entries.description: In this fully animated, all-new take on the Smurfs, a mysterious map sets Smurfette and her friends Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on an exciting race through the Forbidden Forest leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Columbia Pictures,Sony Pictures Animation,Kerner Entertainment Company

entries.title: The Great Wall
entries.description: European mercenaries searching for black powder become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Universal Pictures,Atlas Entertainment,China Film Group,Le Vision Pictures,Legendary Entertainment,Legendary East,Kava Productions

entries.title: Life
entries.description: The six-member crew of the International Space Station is tasked with studying a sample from Mars that may be the first proof of extra-terrestrial life, which proves more intelligent than ever expected.

entries.title: Ant-Man
entries.description: Armed with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, master thief Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Doctor Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats. Against seemingly insurmountable obstacles, Pym and Lang must plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

entries.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
entries.description: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men and The Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

entries.title: Spider-Man
entries.description: After being bitten by a genetically altered spider, nerdy high school student Peter Parker is endowed with amazing powers.

entries.title: Iron Man
entries.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

credits.role: Lt. Col. James "Rhodey" Rhodes / War Machine
credits.name: Terrence Howard

entries.title: Thor
entries.description: Against his father Odin's will, The Mighty Thor -a powerful but arrogant warrior god -recklessly reignites an ancient war. Thor is cast down to Earth and forced to live among humans as punishment. Once here, Thor learns what it takes to be a true hero when the most dangerous villain of his world sends the darkest forces of Asgard to invade Earth.

entries.title: The Avengers
entries.description: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!

credits.role: New York Police Officer in Firefight (uncredited)
credits.name: Jeff Seich

entries.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
entries.description: After the cataclysmic events in New York with The Avengers, Steve Rogers, aka Captain America is living quietly in Washington, D.C. and trying to adjust to the modern world. But when a S.H.I.E.L.D. colleague comes under attack, Steve becomes embroiled in a web of intrigue that threatens to put the world at risk. Joining forces with the Black Widow, Captain America struggles to expose the ever-widening conspiracy while fighting off professional assassins sent to silence him at every turn. When the full scope of the villainous plot is revealed, Captain America and the Black Widow enlist the help of a new ally, the Falcon. However, they soon find themselves up against an unexpected and formidable enemyâthe Winter Soldier.

entries.title: Assassin's Creed
entries.description: Through unlocked genetic memories that allow him to relive the adventures of his ancestor in 15th century Spain, Callum Lynch discovers he's a descendant of the secret 'Assassins' society. After gaining incredible knowledge and skills, he is now poised to take on the oppressive Knights Templar in the present day.

entries.title: Power Rangers

Chosen by destiny, our heroes quickly discover they are the only ones who can save the planet. But to do so, they will have to overcome their real-life issues and before itâs too late, band together as the Power Rangers.

credits.role: Jason Lee Scott / The Red Ranger
credits.name: Dacre Montgomery

entries.title: Hacksaw Ridge
entries.description: WWII American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first Conscientious Objector in American history to win the Congressional Medal of Honor.

entries.title: Lion
entries.description: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia; 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

entries.title: Hidden Figures
entries.description: The untold story of Katherine G. Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson â brilliant African-American women working at NASA and serving as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history â the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit. The visionary trio crossed all gender and race lines to inspire generations to dream big.

entries.title: Ballerina
entries.description: Set in 1879 Paris. An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house.

entries.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
entries.description: In the absence of Optimus Prime, a battle for survival has commenced between the human race and the Transformers. Cade Yeager forms an alliance with Bumblebee, an English lord, and an Oxford professor to learn why the Transformers keep coming back to Earth.

entries.title: Inferno
entries.description: After waking up in a hospital with amnesia, professor Robert Langdon and a doctor must race against time to foil a deadly global plot.

metadata.name: production_companies
metadata.value: Columbia Pictures,Imagine Entertainment,Mid Atlantic Films,Sony Pictures Releasing,LStar Capital

entries.title: Why Him?
entries.description: Ned, an overprotective dad, visits his daughter at Stanford where he meets his biggest nightmare: her well-meaning but socially awkward Silicon Valley billionaire boyfriend, Laird. A rivalry develops and Ned's panic level goes through the roof when he finds himself lost in this glamorous high-tech world and learns Laird is about to pop the question.

This bizarre occurrence continues to happen randomly, and the two must adjust their lives around each other.

entries.title: Thor: Ragnarok
entries.description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his homeworld and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of an all-powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

entries.title: The Founder
entries.description: The true story of how Ray Kroc, a salesman from Illinois, met Mac and Dick McDonald, who were running a burger operation in 1950s Southern California. Kroc was impressed by the brothersâ speedy system of making the food and saw franchise potential. He maneuvered himself into a position to be able to pull the company from the brothers and create a billion-dollar empire.

Recruiting an all-new group of thrill-seeking cohorts, Xander finds himself enmeshed in a deadly conspiracy that points to collusion at the highest levels of world governments.

entries.title: The Girl on the Train
entries.description: Rachel Watson, devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day, until one morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds.

metadata.name: production_companies

entries.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
entries.description: John Wick is forced out of retirement by a former associate looking to seize control of a shadowy international assassinsâ guild. Bound by a blood oath to aid him, Wick travels to Rome and does battle against some of the worldâs most dangerous killers.

entries.title: Fifty Shades Darker
entries.description: When a wounded Christian Grey tries to entice a cautious Ana Steele back into his life, she demands a new arrangement before she will give him another chance. As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christianâs past start to circle the couple, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.

entries.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
entries.description: Having taken her first steps into a larger world in Star Wars: The Force Awakens (2015), Rey continues her epic journey with Finn, Poe and Luke Skywalker in the next chapter of the saga.

entries.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
entries.description: Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by an old rival, Captain Salazar, who along with his crew of ghost pirates has escaped from the Devil's Triangle, and is determined to kill every pirate at sea. Jack seeks the Trident of Poseidon, a powerful artifact that grants its possessor total control over the seas, in order to defeat Salazar.

metadata.name: production_companies

entries.title: Allied
entries.description: In 1942, an intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.
